name: What are you?
text: You have founded a city; here begins your nation's new ambitions. What do you want to become in the future?

uniques: Comment [An empire has difficulty founding new cities, but in compensation it is easier for them to build up their military base and conquer cities.]

Comment [A colonial empire has no problem founding colonies in unfamiliar lands, but these colonies are less effective scientifically, culturally, and religiously. But it is possible for them to transform these colonies into real cities.]
Comment [A state is... just a state, no advantages, no disadvantages]

name: New way?
text: Your state is in crisis, the population is unhappy and wants change!
uniques: Only available <after adopting [State...]> <when below [0] Happiness> <after turn number [20]>
Comment [Change and become an empire. For the happiness of your people.]
Comment [Change and become a colonial empire. For the happiness of your people.]
